Posts.Content: On 3/5/2008 Versace wrote: HELLO EVERYONE.... I  was wondering if anyone has knots sticking out of thier wrist and severe joint pain around wrist. thumbs are hard to move .the pain is getting worse.. and i have swelling or knot on my  left rib under breast looks like my rib has a point to it. my joint pain and back pain  keeps getting worse... i do take aromasin and i have lose bone density.. had a infusion 4 week ago for my bones.. my pain pill are not working that well ..should i switch to arimidex?? if anyone  could help me i would appreciated.... thank s     LOVE PEACE AND CURE I don't believe I am reading this, YOU SOUND LIKE MY TWIN!!!!! I have been on Aromasin for 6 months and in that time I have developed pointy knots in both wrists, noticeable and painful to touch, very limited movement of both my thumbs and severe wrist pain (both). I am having a bone scan and bone density in 2 weeks and I just "feel it in my bones" if you will pardon the pun, that there will be an extreme difference in my bone density, it will be way down....You are not alone.. Peace love and cure to you as well
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin
